entry.title: BIP: Full Replace-by-Fee deployment schedule
entry.summary: In an email exchange on June 29, 2015, Luke Dashjr argued that policy is node/miner fiat and not the domain of BIPs. However, another participant disagreed and stated that BIPs about best practices or anything related to interop or coordination are reasonable uses of the process. For instance, knowing what other kinds of policy are in use can be helpful when authoring transactions.
